Title: LRO LOLA Hillshade 128ppd, Endurance-A Site C
Abstract: 这是原始LOLA数字高程模型（DEM）版本4的阴影浮雕，裁剪为Endurance-a站点C的50x50 km区域。DEM是基于LOLA仪器截至2011年9月获得的测高数据，分辨率为128像素/度的月球形状图（半径）。地面轨迹是使用Generic Mapping Tools程序surface和grdblend进行插值的。该地图采用二进制表的形式，每0.007813度纬度有一行，像素注册。地图值指的是1737400米的半径。
Projection:
PROJCS['ESRI PE String = PROJCS['Site_C_ortho',
	GEOGCS['GCS_Moon_2000',
		DATUM['D_Moon_2000',SPHEROID['Moon_2000_IAU_IAG',1737400.0,0.0]],
		PRIMEM['Reference_Meridian',0.0],UNIT['Degree',0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION['Orthographic'],
	PARAMETER['False_Easting',0.0],
	PARAMETER['False_Northing',0.0],
	PARAMETER['Longitude_Of_Center',176.56079],
	PARAMETER['Latitude_Of_Center',-61.25954],UNIT['Meter',1.0]]',
	GEOGCS['GCS_Moon_2000',
		DATUM['D_Moon_2000',SPHEROID['Moon_2000_IAU_IAG',1737400,0]],
		PRIMEM['Reference_Meridian',0],UNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION['Orthographic'],
	PARAMETER['latitude_of_origin',-61.25954],
	PARAMETER['central_meridian',176.56079],
	PARAMETER['false_easting',0],
	PARAMETER['false_northing',0],UNIT['metre',1,AUTHORITY['EPSG','9001']]]
